Synopsis: A crime is tracked from two separate vantage points: the police investigation and the prosecution in court.

Title: Fargo
Cast: Stars:, Billy Bob Thornton, , Martin Freeman, , Allison Tolman, , Colin Hanks
Synopsis: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Yet all of these tales mysteriously lead back one way or another to Fargo, North Dakota.

Title: Goodfellas
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Robert De Niro, , Ray Liotta, , Joe Pesci, , Lorraine Bracco
Synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

Title: The X-Files
Cast: Stars:, David Duchovny, , Gillian Anderson, , Mitch Pileggi, , William B. Davis
Synopsis: Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.

Title: The Batman
Cast: Director:, Matt Reeves, | ,     Stars:, Robert Pattinson, , Zoë Kravitz, , Jeffrey Wright, , Colin Farrell
Synopsis: When a sadistic serial killer begins murdering key political figures in Gotham, Batman is forced to investigate the city's hidden corruption and question his family's involvement.

Title: Blue Bloods
Cast: Stars:, Donnie Wahlberg, , Bridget Moynahan, , Will Estes, , Len Cariou
Synopsis: Revolves around a family of New York cops.

Title: Candy
Cast: Stars:, Jessica Biel, , Melanie Lynskey, , Pablo Schreiber, , Timothy Simons
Synopsis: Candy Montgomery is a 1980s housewife and mother who did everything right. When the pressure of conformity builds within, her actions scream for just a bit of freedom -- until someone tells her to shush -- with deadly results.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Cast: Director:, Chad Stahelski, | ,     Stars:, Keanu Reeves, , Laurence Fishburne, , George Georgiou, , Lance Reddick
Synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Fast X
Cast: Director:, Louis Leterrier, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jason Statham, , Jordana Brewster
Synopsis: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

Title: Love & Death
Cast: Stars:, Elizabeth Olsen, , Jesse Plemons, , Lily Rabe, , Patrick Fugit
Synopsis: Two churchgoing couples enjoy small town family life in Texas - until somebody picks up an axe.

Title: Killers of the Flower Moon
Cast: Director:, Martin Scorsese, | ,     Stars:, Leonardo DiCaprio, , Robert De Niro, , Lily Gladstone, , Jesse Plemons
Synopsis: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s, sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Breaking Bad
Cast: Stars:, Bryan Cranston, , Aaron Paul, , Anna Gunn, , Betsy Brandt
Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.

Title: The Blacklist
Cast: Stars:, James Spader, , Megan Boone, , Diego Klattenhoff, , Ryan Eggold
Synopsis: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.

Title: The Rookie
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Alyssa Diaz, , Richard T. Jones, , Melissa O'Neil
Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: Better Call Saul
Cast: Stars:, Bob Odenkirk, , Rhea Seehorn, , Jonathan Banks, , Patrick Fabian
Synopsis: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill in the years leading up to his fateful run-in with Walter White and Jesse Pinkman.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: The Sopranos
Cast: Stars:, James Gandolfini, , Lorraine Bracco, , Edie Falco, , Michael Imperioli
Synopsis: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life that affect his mental state, leading him to seek professional psychiatric counseling.

Title: Poker Face
Cast: Stars:, Natasha Lyonne, , Benjamin Bratt, , Simon Helberg, , Pedro Hollywood
Synopsis: Charlie has an extraordinary ability to determine when someone is lying. She hits the road with her Plymouth Barracuda and with every stop encounters a new cast of characters and strange crimes she can't help but investigate and solve.

Title: S.W.A.T.
Cast: Stars:, Shemar Moore, , Alex Russell, , Kenny Johnson, , Jay Harrington
Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Title: To Catch a Killer
Cast: Director:, Damián Szifron, | ,     Stars:, Shailene Woodley, , Ben Mendelsohn, , Jovan Adepo, , Ralph Ineson
Synopsis: Baltimore. New Year's Eve. A talented but troubled police officer (Shailene Woodley) is recruited by the FBI's chief investigator (Ben Mendelsohn) to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorizing the city.

Title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
Cast: Stars:, Mariska Hargitay, , Christopher Meloni, , Ice-T, , Dann Florek
Synopsis: This series follows the Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of detectives in the New York City Police Department that investigate sexually related crimes.

Title: NCIS
Cast: Stars:, David McCallum, , Sean Murray, , Mark Harmon, , Brian Dietzen
Synopsis: The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team.

Title: True Detective
Cast: Stars:, Vince Vaughn, , Colin Farrell, , Rachel McAdams, , Taylor Kitsch
Synopsis: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth the personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.

Title: Criminal Minds
Cast: Stars:, Kirsten Vangsness, , Matthew Gray Gubler, , A.J. Cook, , Joe Mantegna
Synopsis: A group of criminal profilers who work for the FBI as members of its Behavioral Analysis Unit (BAU) using behavioral analysis and profiling to help investigate crimes and find the suspect known as the unsub.

Title: Midsomer Murders
Cast: Stars:, John Nettles, , Jane Wymark, , Barry Jackson, , Neil Dudgeon
Synopsis: A veteran Detective Chief Inspector and his young Sergeant investigate murders around the regional community of Midsomer County.

Title: Anatomy of a Fall
Cast: Director:, Justine Triet, | ,     Stars:, Sandra Hüller, , Swann Arlaud, , Milo Machado Graner, , Antoine Reinartz
Synopsis: A woman is suspected of her husband's murder, and their blind son faces a moral dilemma as the sole witness.

Title: Peaky Blinders
Cast: Stars:, Cillian Murphy, , Paul Anderson, , Sophie Rundle, , Helen McCrory
Synopsis: A gangster family epic set in 1900s England, centering on a gang who sew razor blades in the peaks of their caps, and their fierce boss Tommy Shelby.

Title: F9: The Fast Saga
Cast: Director:, Justin Lin, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jordana Brewster, , Tyrese Gibson
Synopsis: Dom and the crew must take on an international terrorist who turns out to be Dom and Mia's estranged brother.

Title: The Wire
Cast: Stars:, Dominic West, , Lance Reddick, , Sonja Sohn, , Wendell Pierce
Synopsis: The Baltimore drug scene, as seen through the eyes of drug dealers and law enforcement.

Title: Inside Man
Cast: Stars:, David Tennant, , Stanley Tucci, , Dolly Wells, , Lydia West
Synopsis: A prisoner on death row in the US and a woman trapped in a cellar under an English vicarage, cross paths in the most unexpected way.

Title: Mayans M.C.
Cast: Stars:, Michael Irby, , Frankie Loyal, , JD Pardo, , Clayton Cardenas
Synopsis: Set in a post-Jax Teller world, "Mayans MC" sees EZ Reyes, a former golden boy now fresh out of prison, as a prospect in the Mayan MC charter on the California-Mexico border who must carve out his new outlaw identity.

Title: The Godfather
Cast: Director:, Francis Ford Coppola, | ,     Stars:, Marlon Brando, , Al Pacino, , James Caan, , Diane Keaton
Synopsis: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

Title: Las Vegas
Cast: Stars:, Josh Duhamel, , James Caan, , James Lesure, , Vanessa Marcil
Synopsis: Welcome to the Montecito Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, where you can do anything you want, but Ed Deline and his crack surveillance team will be watching. Just remember: what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas.

Title: Reacher
Cast: Stars:, Alan Ritchson, , Malcolm Goodwin, , Willa Fitzgerald, , Hugh Thompson
Synopsis: Jack Reacher was arrested for murder and now the police need his help. Based on the books by Lee Child.

Title: Bones
Cast: Stars:, Emily Deschanel, , David Boreanaz, , Michaela Conlin, , T.J. Thyne
Synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance "Bones" Brennan and cocky F.B.I. Special Agent Seeley Booth build a team to investigate murders. Quite often, there isn't more to examine than rotten flesh or mere bones.

Title: Justified
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Nick Searcy, , Joelle Carter, , Jacob Pitts
Synopsis: Enforcing his own brand of justice, US Marshal Raylan, a strong-willed, quiet law-man haunted by his past, returns to his native town to see that justice is served to those in need.

Title: Happy Valley
Cast: Stars:, Sarah Lancashire, , Siobhan Finneran, , James Norton, , Rhys Connah
Synopsis: Yorkshire-based crime drama centering on the personal and professional life of Police Sergeant Catherine Cawood.

Title: Banshee
Cast: Stars:, Antony Starr, , Ivana Milicevic, , Ulrich Thomsen, , Frankie Faison
Synopsis: An ex-con assumes the identity of a murdered sheriff in the small town of Banshee, Pennsylvania, where he has some unfinished business.

Title: Wednesday
Cast: Stars:, Jenna Ortega, , Hunter Doohan, , Percy Hynes White, , Emma Myers
Synopsis: Follows Wednesday Addams' years as a student, when she attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree, and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents.

Title: John Wick
Cast: Directors:, Chad Stahelski, , David Leitch, | ,     Stars:, Keanu Reeves, , Michael Nyqvist, , Alfie Allen, , Willem Dafoe
Synopsis: An ex-hitman comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters who killed his dog and stole his car.

Title: Girl in the Basement
Cast: Director:, Elisabeth Röhm, | ,     Stars:, Judd Nelson, , Stefanie Scott, , Joely Fisher, , Emma Myers
Synopsis: Sarah is a teen girl who is looking forward to her 18th birthday to move away from her controlling father Don. But before she could even blow out the candles, Don imprisons her in the basement of their home.

Title: The Fast and the Furious
Cast: Director:, Rob Cohen, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Paul Walker, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jordana Brewster
Synopsis: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

Title: Steeltown Murders
Cast: Stars:, Sion Alun Davies, , Steffan Rhodri, , Aneurin Barnard, , Scott Arthur
Synopsis: Three murders - unsolved but never forgotten. Thirty years on, can DCI Bethall find the serial killer who terrorised 1970s Port Talbot?
